name: Puno and Lake Titicaca
description:
This is an amazing Package that allows you to visit one of the highest lakes on the world; Lake Titicaca not only is located in a really high altitude but also is full of history and Inca Culture! I invite you to visit this amazing Peruvian destination, which complements your Machu Picchu Visit.
You can get here by plane or by bus from Cusco (a nice full day bus ride that allows you to see deferent and incredible towns along the way)
